messages.subject: New Pic of Okita's Grave
messages.msgSnippet: Not from the best angle but check it out http://www.aizu.com/shinsengumi/ see 6/23 entry we are a few weeks from Okita s death day the blog is from the Aizu
messages.messageBody:
Not from the best angle but check it out
http://www.aizu.com/shinsengumi/
see 6/23 entry

we are a few weeks from Okita's death day

the blog is from the Aizu Shinsengumi Club which is partnered with the
http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com club

it contains several cosplay photos too and multiple photos of the
Fujita family grave (basically the club goes there ALL the time and
takes other Shinsen-fan visitors there too)
